verses.name: Hosea 2:15
verses.text: And I will give her her vineyards from thence, and the valley of Achor for a door of hope: and she shall sing there, as in the days of her youth, and as in the day when she came up out of the land of Egypt.

verses.name: Hosea 2:16
verses.text: And it shall be at that day, saith the Lord, that thou shalt call me Ishi; and shalt call me no more Baali.

verses.name: Hosea 2:17
verses.text: For I will take away the names of Baalim out of her mouth, and they shall no more be remembered by their name.
